price: (46) The Day their plan will not avail them at all, nor will they be helped.
arabic: يَوۡمَ لَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُمۡ كَيۡدُهُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا هُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: yawma lā yugh'nī ʿanhum kayduhum shayan walā hum yunṣarūna
